p: In vitro susceptibility assay displayed no significant cytotoxicity effect in our extracts, as the selectivity index (SI) was 16.2, 7.67, 7.12 and 1.01 for Q. velutina, C. procera, N. tabacum and Glucantime®, respectively ( Table 1). SI ≥10 was considered nontoxic. As shown in Fig. 1, Q. velutina represented the highest viability of J774 cells in various concentrations compared to the other extracts and Glucantime®. Besides, Glucantime® caused significant lower viability of J774 cells in comparison to three plant extracts, especially in the last four concentrations ( P < 0.001).
